metadata.description: Personal collection of Claude Code skills and plugins

plugins.name: adr
plugins.description: Architecture Decision Records - consult and manage ADRs for project design decisions

plugins.name: reviewer
plugins.description: Layered code review framework with extensible core reviews, parallel orchestration, and project-local customization

plugins.name: codex

plugins.description: Extra review types for the reviewer framework that depend on other plugins

plugins.name: planner
plugins.description: Enhanced planning with complexity scoring, sub-problem decomposition, and plan review
